subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James said last night that he would play in next month’s FIBA America’s Tournament, in which the United States will try to qualify for the 2008 Olympics.“I’ve had enough time off, and knowing my body more than anybody, I’m ready to play,” James said. “I don’t know how much I’m going to play or how extensively, but I’ll be ready.”For several months, James had said he was “50-50” about playing. With Cleveland making it to the N.B.A. finals, James may have wanted time off after playing more than 100 games since October.
